bind

public boolean bind(java.lang.String key)
Bind the shader to the OpenGL pipeline. If the key for the shader returns null, the default OpenGL shaders are used. Whichever shader is used is set to be the active shader.

Parameters:
key - String key of the shader to be bound.
Returns:
boolean value that returns true if the provided shader was bound or false if the provided shader was null.

bind

public boolean bind()
Bind the active shader to the OpenGL pipeline. If the active shader is null, the default OpenGL pipeline is used. The default shader is then set to be the active shader.

Returns:
boolean value that returns true if the active shader was bound or false if the active shader was null.

bindDefault

public void bindDefault()
Bind the default OpenGL shaders. Sets the default shader to be the active shader.

createShader

public void createShader(java.lang.String key,
                         java.lang.String vertexShaderSource,
                         java.lang.String fragmentShaderSource)
                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Create a shader with the provided shader source. The created shader is then stored by the key passed.

Parameters:
key - String key that the shader will be referenced by.
vertexShaderSource - Source of the vertex shader to be compiled into shader.
fragmentShaderSource - Source of the fragment shader to be compiled into the shader.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If the vertex shader or fragment shader failed to compile or if the shader program failed to link, an exception will be thrown with a message regarding which component broke.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

putFloatBuffer

public void putFloatBuffer(java.lang.String varName,
                           java.nio.FloatBuffer buf)
Pass a FloatBuffer to the active shader. The shader to which the value will be passed must be bound.

Parameters:
varName - Name of the variable that is in the shader program. Must be an exact match.
buf - FloatBuffer to be passed to the shader.

putFloat

public void putFloat(java.lang.String varName,
                     float x)
Pass a float to the active shader. The shader to which the value will be passed must be bound.

Parameters:
varName - Name of the variable that is in the shader program. Must be an exact match.
x - Primitive float to be passed to the shader.

                 throws java.lang.NullPointerException

v - LWJGL Vector2f.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException

putInt

public void putInt(java.lang.String varName,
                   int x)
Pass an integer to the active shader. The shader to which the value will be passed must be bound.

Parameters:
varName - String name of the variable that is in the shader program. Must be an exact match.
x - Primitive integer to be passed to the shader.

setActiveShader

public boolean setActiveShader(java.lang.String key)
Set the active shader to the shader bound to the key provided. If no shader exists at this location, return false.

Parameters:
key - Name the shader is registered with.
Returns:
boolean - returns true if a value is at that location or false if it's null

getInstance

public static ShaderManager getInstance()
Get the singleton instance of the ShaderManager

Returns:
singleton instance of ShaderManager

unbind

public void unbind()
Unbind any shader program currently in use. This sets to use the default OpenGL pipeline.
